author: Koyoharu Gotouge
review: Follow Tanjiro Kamado and his journey as a demon slayer, seeking revenge for his family and finding a cure for his demon-turned sister, Nezuko.

author: Yuji Kaku
review: Dive into the world of vampires, ghouls, and the Hellsing Organization led by the enigmatic Alucard, as they combat supernatural threats to humanity.

author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
review: Experience the dark and twisted world of Denji, a devil hunter who merges with his chainsaw dog, Pochita, to become the powerful Chainsaw Man.

author: Riichiro Inagaki
review: Join Senku Ishigami and his friends as they rebuild civilization from scratch using science after humanity is petrified for thousands of years.

author: Akira Toriyama
review: Join Goku and his friends as they face new powerful foes and embark on adventures across the universe in this continuation of the Dragon Ball series.

author: Isuna Hasekura
review: Follow the travels of a traveling merchant, Kraft Lawrence, and his companion, a wise wolf deity named Holo, as they journey through medieval Europe.

author: Reki Kawahara
review: Dive into the virtual reality MMORPG world of Sword Art Online, where players find themselves trapped in a game of life and death, battling to survive and escape.

author: Hajime Isayama
review: In a world overrun by giants known as Titans, humanity's survival hinges on the efforts of a group of soldiers fighting back against the monstrous threat.

author: Tsugumi Ohba
review: When a high school student discovers a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name, he sets out on a quest to cleanse the world of criminals as the enigmatic vigilante known as Kira.

author: Naotaka Hayashi
review: Join Rintarou Okabe and his eccentric group of friends as they inadvertently discover time travel and become embroiled in a conspiracy that could change the fate of humanity.

bookName: Re:Zero − Starting Life in Another World
author: Tappei Nagatsuki
review: Experience Subaru Natsuki's journey as he finds himself transported to a fantasy world and discovers the power to rewind time after his death, forcing him to confront his own weaknesses and unravel the mysteries surrounding his newfound abilities.

author: Gege Akutami
review: Follow Yuji Itadori and his journey as he becomes a part of the world of sorcery, battling curses and evil forces in a bid to save humanity.

author: Kanehito Yamada
review: Experience the eternal journey of an immortal hero as she seeks to understand the fleeting nature of life, friendship, and purpose.

author: Gen Urobuchi
review: Set in a world where mages summon legendary heroes to fight in a deadly battle royale known as the Holy Grail War, Fate/Zero is a dark and gripping tale of ambition, betrayal, and the consequences of power.
